services.title: Full Lawn Leaf Removal
services.desc: Let’s keep your yard feeling cozy and clean! I’ll carefully remove fallen leaves so your outdoor space stays tidy, inviting, and ready to enjoy.

services.title: Snow Removal
services.desc: Let’s keep your home safe and cozy this winter! I’ll clear snow with care so your driveway and walkways stay clean, easy to use, and welcoming for everyone who visits.

services.title: Lawn Mowing
services.desc: Keep your lawn neat and green.

services.title: Garden Care
services.desc: Weed, trim, and maintain your garden.
